relation: Returns a value that indicates whether the solver is being requested to stop or has already stopped.
Gets the number of backtracks during a search.
Gets the collection of constraint functions added to a solver.
Gets a Boolean domain that contains 0 (false) and 1 (true).
Gets a domain that represents the minimum to maximum finite values supported by a solver.
Gets a domain with the empty set.
Gets the number of minimization goals.
Returns a value that indicates whether a model in a solver is empty.
Returns a value that indicates whether the last solve operation was interrupted.
Gets the maximum integer value for the CSP solver.
Gets the minimum integer value for a CSP solver.
Gets the collection of constraint functions that have been added to a solver.
Gets or sets the debug mode for a solver.
Gets a set of parameters with default values and a callback function to query about cancelling the solve process.
Gets the global precision setting for real values in a solver.
A function that is called periodically through the computation to determine if the user has cancelled the operation.
Gets the collection of variables that have been instantiated for a solver.
Gets the version of a solver.
